result.arabic_text: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا
result.translation: Kuma wanda ya tũba,* kuma ya aikata aiki mai kyau, to, lalle ne sai ya tũba zuwa gaAllah.
result.footnotes: * Wanda ya tũba daga kõwane irin zunubi, waɗanda aka ambata da waɗanda ba a ambata ba, kõ dã laifinsa kãfirci ne, to, sai ya tũba zuwa ga Allah kawai, tũba ta gaskiya, lalle ne Allah zai karɓi tũbarsa matuƙar ajalin mutuwa bai sauka a kansa ba.
